project.name: YouTube Shorts AI Studio
project.description: A full-stack web application for automating YouTube Shorts content creation with AI-powered scripts, voice synthesis, video rendering, and thumbnail creation.

backend.server/routes.ts: // Complete API routes for authentication, content, dashboard stats, schedules, analytics, etc.
backend.server/storage.ts: // Database storage implementation with Drizzle ORM
backend.server/replitAuth.ts: // Replit OIDC authentication setup with Passport.js
backend.server/services/automationService.ts: // Automation pipeline service with cron scheduling
backend.server/services/gemini.ts: // Google Gemini AI integration for script and thumbnail generation

frontend.client/src/App.tsx: // React Router setup with authentication, pages, and providers
frontend.client/src/index.css: // Tailwind CSS with custom YouTube dark theme variables

pages.Dashboard.tsx: // Main dashboard with automation pipeline, stats, and controls

installation_instructions.1: Clone or download this project structure
installation_instructions.3: Set up environment variables (DATABASE_URL, API keys, etc.)
installation_instructions.4: Run 'npm run db:push' to set up database schema
installation_instructions.5: Run 'npm run dev' for development or 'npm run build && npm start' for production
installation_instructions.6: Configure external API keys for Gemini, email, and video services
